title: How to Draw: League of Legends
creator: Fun Art Draw

extendedInfo.description: For all League of Legends fans!The great way to proov how good you are in this game!Draw you favoutite charcter with the help of our app!In this application you will find a step-by-step instructions to draw 15 LOL heroes.Draw yourself and tell your friends.Each drawing divided in 20 to 40 steps, and its easy to follow.Have fun with this lessons at home, in school, on paper, chalk on asphalt - do it everywhere!If you already check League of Legends Champions list, League of Legends Quiz, League of Legends wallpapers and League of Legends Encyclopedia it is time to draw your favorite hero.â 30 LOL Champions drawing tutorials âIn our application you will find lessons that will teach you how to draw:â Alistarâ Amumuâ Annieâ Brand	â Caitlynâ Dr.Mundoâ Fizzâ Gragasâ Graves		â Katarinaâ Kayleâ Kenenâ Lee Sinâ Riven	â TeemoAnd 15 new champions :â Leonaâ Malphiteâ Wukongâ Morganaâ Nidaleeâ Nocturneâ Olafâ Rammusâ Rumbleâ Skarnerâ Tristanaâ Vayneâ Vladimirâ YorickLearn how to draw and improve your skill in no time with the help of our simple android application. Whether you're an art teacher, art student, or just a hobbyist artist you will find the step by step education that will give you the ability to bring those images in your mind into paper reality.Being a kid or a novice artist can sometimes get discouraging because of the lack of skills one has when they are in this artistic stage. Learning how to draw in a very simple manner is the best way to advance your skills to becoming a better artist. It doesn't matter if you are thirteen, or thirty, there is a lot of concepts you can tackle as you browse our program. There is one thing that is certain, you will definitely become a better artist just by tackling the lessons you find here. So go ahead and try and draw, because no matter what you choose to do, you are guaranteed to achieve your artistic goals. Have fun everyone!Short review of League of Legends you will draw in our application:â Alistar, the MinotaurA large minotaur who is a playable character in League of Legends. His name is a play on Allstar, a version of DotA made by Guinsoo. He is also voiced by Harlan Hogan who also did Thrall in Warcraft 3.â Amumu, the Sad MummyAmumu is a tank champion in the strategy game League of Legends.â Annie, the Dark ChildOne of the heroes in the game League of Legends, Annie is known as the Dark Child. With her shadow bear companion Tibbers that she keeps with her in stuffed form, Annie contains the innocent desire to rule the world.â Brand, the Burning VengeanceBrand is fire-based caster champion who relies on syncing together his abilities in order to do massive damage.â Caitlyn, the Sheriff of PiltoverCaitlyn is a champion that has joined the League of Legends. She is a ranged physical DPS.â Dr. Mundo, the Madman of ZaunDr. Mundo is a tank/physical dps champion in the strategy game League of Legends.â Fizz, the Tidal TricksterA melee assasin character in the League of Legendsâ Gragas, the Rabble RouserA Champion in the League of Legends. Known as the Rabble Rouser, he is obese and shamelessly in love with alcohol.â Emmett GravesEmmett Graves is the protagonist in Starhawk.â Katarina, the Sinister BladeKatarina is a physical/caster dps champion in the strategy game League of Legends.â Kayle, the JudicatorKayle is a versatile champion in the strategy game League of Legends.â Lee Sin, the Blind MonkLee Sin is a champion in the game league of legends that uses energy as a resourceâ Teemo, the Swift ScoutTeemo is a caster/physical dps in the strategy game League of Legends.â  â .. and many more!

reviews.title: A great app!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It gives you a great guide of how to draw my fave character, Kennen, and a lot of others! I highly recommend this! :)
reviews.author: Sydney Betts

reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.comment: Great step by step guide.
reviews.author: Geoo Guan

reviews.title: Great!!!
reviews.comment: I love this app, it gives me a really good visual walk through. I love it!
reviews.author: Ambria Christensen

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Awesome easy to fallow instructions that make it fun to recreate these images
reviews.author: Dustin Mikolic

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I enjoy this app very much I love the pictures and the easy to follow instructions
reviews.author: Brittany Steckly

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Loved it..simple fast and detailed...so satisfied with it
reviews.author: Duke Jones

reviews.title: Promising
reviews.comment: I would love if i could actually draw teemo and not his skin same with alot of others would be awesome if it had every skin for all champs that = 5stars
reviews.author: Kyle Fullenkamp

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: Its very good but it would be nice if you could add more champs, other than that awsome i recommend
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I quite enjoy this, but wish there were more
reviews.comment: I really love LoL and the art they have, this is an exceptional app but I wish there were more champs on it
reviews.author: Catt Harvey

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very well made, detailed and easy to use

reviews.comment: Please add shaco. He\'s been my favorite champ since day one. I was trying to draw masked shaco but I epically failed...

reviews.title: Needs to have a big update!
reviews.comment: I like this app but it needs an update for all the new champions(darius, zed, khazix, etc, zac etc....) and choices for which skin of what champion to draw, but for now only 3 stars
reviews.author: Calvin Bui

reviews.comment: Pretty good for drawings but some normals are kind of hard. Probably because I dont usually draw.\tAmazed

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Alright so far no problems with the app just needs more champs

reviews.title: nt bad...
reviews.comment: well tis app teaches you how to draw the champs detailed n useful for those hu r bad at art but oni teaches how to draw limited champs ill giv 5 stars if they had all...
reviews.author: gabriel Tan

reviews.title: Just awesome
reviews.comment: I LOVE IT. JUST NEEDS MORE CHAMPIONS AND THEIR SKINS

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Simple. Easy to follow steps perfect for both beginners and advanced drawers. 5 stars great app!
